DellOemJob.description: This version was added to add new Oem extension.
DellOemJob.longDescription: This version was added to add new Oem extension.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ActualRunningStartTime.description: The time when a job moves into the Running state.
ActualRunningStartTime.longDescription: The actual running start time in Edm.DateTime format comes from when the job is moved into the running state. Zero is a legal value if the job never started running.

ActualRunningStopTime.description: The time when the job left the running state.
ActualRunningStopTime.longDescription: The actual running stop time in Edm.DateTime format comes from when the job is moved out of the running state. Zero is a legal value if the job never stopped running or job never got into a running state.

JobType.description: This property represent configuration type of job.
JobType.longDescription: The value of this property will be one of the possible configuration type of job.

OemJobState.longDescription: The value of the property specifies the State of the Job.

TargetSettingsURI.description: This property will be resource uri of settings object.
TargetSettingsURI.longDescription: The value of this property will be the URI of a target resource on which the configuration is being applied. This property will be required when creating a job. This Property will be null on GET operation.

UntilTime.description: This property represents End time of Job.
UntilTime.longDescription: This is the timestamp until when the service will wait for a job to complete. If a job did not complete within this time, it will be killed and marked as failed. TIME_NA is a default value that implies EndTime is not applicable. It is optional for clients to specify this property when creating a job.

enumDescriptions.Completed: A job is in completed state
enumDescriptions.CompletedWithErrors: A job is in completed state with errors
enumDescriptions.Downloaded: A job is in downloaded state
enumDescriptions.Downloading: A job is in downloading state
enumDescriptions.Failed: A job is in failed state
enumDescriptions.New: A job is in newly created state
enumDescriptions.Paused: A job is in paused state
enumDescriptions.PendingActivation: A job is in pending activation state
enumDescriptions.ReadyForExecution: A job is in ready for execution state
enumDescriptions.RebootCompleted: A job is in reboot completed state
enumDescriptions.RebootFailed: A job is in reboot failed state
enumDescriptions.RebootPending: A job is in pending state for reboot
enumDescriptions.Running: A job is in running state
enumDescriptions.Scheduled: A job is in scheduled state
enumDescriptions.Scheduling: A job is in scheduling state
enumDescriptions.Unknown: A job is in unknown state
enumDescriptions.Waiting: A job is in waiting state

enumDescriptions.ExportConfiguration: A server configuration profile export job
enumDescriptions.ImportConfiguration: A server configuration profile import job
enumDescriptions.LCConfig: A lifecycle controller attribute configuration job
enumDescriptions.LCLogExport: A lifecycle controller log export job
enumDescriptions.RealTimeNoRebootConfiguration: A real time configuration job without reboot
enumDescriptions.RebootForce: A reboot job with forced shutdown
enumDescriptions.RebootNoForce: A graceful reboot job without forced shutdown
enumDescriptions.RemoteDiagnostics: A diagnostics collection job from iDRAC
enumDescriptions.RepositoryUpdate: An update job from a repository
enumDescriptions.SACollectExportHealthData: Support Assist collect and export health data job
enumDescriptions.SACollectHealthData: Support Assist collect health data job
enumDescriptions.SAExportHealthData: Support Assist export health data job
enumDescriptions.SAExposeISM: Support Assist expose iSM installer package to host job
enumDescriptions.SARegistration: Support Assist register iDRAC to Dell backend server job
enumDescriptions.SEKMRekey: A Secure Enterprise Key Manager rekey job
enumDescriptions.SEKMStatusSet: A Secure Enterprise Key Manager status set job

title: #DellOemJob.v1_0_0
